snippet: The former environment minister who briefly led Brazil's presidential race threw added support on Friday to the man who beat her for second place and a spot in a runoff election against President Dilma Rousseff....

headline.print_headline: Ousted Brazil Candidate Meets, Endorses Challenger
headline.main: Ousted Brazil Candidate Meets, Endorses Challenger

lead_paragraph: The former environment minister who briefly led Brazil's presidential race threw added support on Friday to the man who beat her for second place and a spot in a runoff election against President Dilma Rousseff.
